text: Courthouse building on Cambridge Street This is the court that has jurisdiction over probate and family matters in Middlesex County, Massachusetts. It has two locations: 208 Cambridge Street and 121 Third Street, both in Cambridge, Massachusetts. == Jurisdiction == The Middlesex Probate and Family Court has "exclusive jurisdiction over probate matters such as wills, trusts, guardianships, and conservatorships. The Court also has jurisdiction over family-related matters such as divorce, support, paternity establishment, family abuse protection, elderly abuse protection, disabled person's abuse protection, custody and adoption."Massachusetts Probate Court Directory == References == Category:Massachusetts state courts Category:Government of Massachusetts Category:Family courts Category:Probate courts in the United States Category:Courts and tribunals with year of establishment missing
title: Middlesex Probate and Family Court
